description: An improper neutralization of input during web page generation vulnerability [CWE-79] in FortiAuthenticator OWA Agent for Microsoft version 2.2 and 2.1 may allow an unauthenticated attacker to perform an XSS attack via crafted HTTP GET requests.

enisaIdProduct.product_version: FortiAuthenticator Agent for Microsoft OWA version 2.2 and 2.1.
